titles.title: Guam Cigarette Tax Enforcement Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to include Guam for purposes of statutes prohibiting trafficking in contraband cigarettes, and for other purposes.
Guam Cigarette Tax Enforcement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Guam Cigarette Tax Enforcement Act
This bill extends the existing prohibition on trafficking in contraband cigarettes and contraband smokeless tobacco to Guam.
